canisters.description: Mapping between canisters and their settings.

dfx.title: dfx version
dfx.description: Pins the dfx version for this project.

networks.description: Mapping between network names and their configurations. Networks 'ic' and 'local' are implicitly defined.

output_env_file.description: If set, environment variables will be output to this file (without overwriting any user-defined variables, if the file already exists).

version.description: Used to keep track of dfx.json versions.

BitcoinAdapterLogLevel.description: Represents the log level of the bitcoin adapter.

CanisterDeclarationsConfig.title: Declarations Configuration
CanisterDeclarationsConfig.description: Configurations about which canister interface declarations to generate, and where to generate them.

bindings.title: Languages to generate
bindings.description: A list of languages to generate type declarations. Supported options are 'js', 'ts', 'did', 'mo'. Default is ['js', 'ts', 'did'].

env_override.title: Canister ID ENV Override
env_override.description: A string that will replace process.env.{canister_name_uppercase}_CANISTER_ID in the 'src/dfx/assets/language_bindings/canister.js' template.

node_compatibility.title: Node compatibility flag
node_compatibility.description: Flag to pre-populate generated declarations with better defaults for various types of projects Default is false

output.title: Declaration Output Directory
output.description: Directory to place declarations for that canister. Default is 'src/declarations/<canister_name>'.

CanisterMetadataSection.title: Canister Metadata Configuration
CanisterMetadataSection.description: Configures a custom metadata section for the canister wasm. dfx uses the first definition of a given name matching the current network, ignoring any of the same name that follow.

content.title: Content
content.description: Content of this metadata section. Conflicts with `path`.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the wasm section

networks.title: Networks
networks.description: Networks this section applies to. If this field is absent, then it applies to all networks. An empty array means this element will not apply to any network.

path.title: Path
path.description: Path to file containing section contents. Conflicts with `content`. For sections with name=`candid:service`, this field is optional, and if not specified, dfx will use the canister's candid definition. If specified for a Motoko canister, the service defined in the specified path must be a valid subtype of the canister's actual candid service definition.

candid.title: Candid File
candid.description: Path of this canister's candid interface declaration.

package.title: Package Name
package.description: Name of the rust package that compiles to this canister's WASM.

build.title: Build Commands
build.description: Commands that are executed in order to produce this canister's assets. Expected to produce assets in one of the paths specified by the 'source' field. Optional if there is no build necessary or the assets can be built using the default `npm run build` command.

source.title: Asset Source Folder
source.description: Folders from which assets are uploaded.

workspace.title: NPM workspace
workspace.description: The workspace in package.json that this canister is in, if it is not in the root workspace.

build.title: Build Commands
build.description: Commands that are executed in order to produce this canister's WASM module. Expected to produce the WASM in the path specified by the 'wasm' field. No build commands are allowed if the `wasm` field is a URL.

candid.title: Candid File
candid.description: Path to this canister's candid interface declaration.  A URL to a candid file is also acceptable.

wasm.title: WASM Path
wasm.description: Path to WASM to be installed. URLs to a WASM module are also acceptable. A canister that has a URL to a WASM module can not also have `build` steps.

id.title: Canister ID
id.description: Principal of the canister on the ic network.

args.title: Canister-Specific Build Argument
args.description: This field defines an additional argument to pass to the Motoko compiler when building the canister.

declarations.title: Declarations Configuration
declarations.description: Defines which canister interface declarations to generate, and where to generate them.

dependencies.title: Dependencies
dependencies.description: Defines on which canisters this canister depends on.

frontend.title: Force Frontend URL
frontend.description: Mostly unused. If this value is not null, a frontend URL is displayed after deployment even if the canister type is not 'asset'.

init_arg.title: Init Arg
init_arg.description: The Candid initialization argument for installing the canister. If the `--argument` or `--argument-file` argument is also provided, this `init_arg` field will be ignored.

initialization_values.title: Resource Allocation Settings
initialization_values.description: Defines initial values for resource allocation settings.

main.title: Path to Canister Entry Point
main.description: Entry point for e.g. Motoko Compiler.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Defines metadata sections to set in the canister .wasm

optimize.title: Optimize Canister WASM
optimize.description: Invoke wasm level optimizations after building the canister. Optimization level can be set to "cycles" to optimize for cycle usage, "size" to optimize for binary size, or any of "O4, O3, O2, O1, O0, Oz, Os". Disabled by default. If this option is specified, the `shrink` option will be ignored.

post_install.title: Post-Install Commands
post_install.description: One or more commands to run post canister installation.

pullable.title: Pullable
pullable.description: Defines required properties so that this canister is ready for `dfx deps pull` by other projects.

remote.title: Remote Configuration
remote.description: Used to mark the canister as 'remote' on certain networks.

shrink.title: Shrink Canister WASM
shrink.description: Whether run `ic-wasm shrink` after building the Canister. Enabled by default for Rust/Motoko canisters. Disabled by default for custom canisters.

specified_id.title: Specified Canister ID
specified_id.description: Attempts to create the canister with this Canister ID. This option only works with non-mainnet replica. If the `--specified-id` argument is also provided, this `specified_id` field will be ignored.

ConfigCanistersCanisterRemote.title: Remote Canister Configuration
ConfigCanistersCanisterRemote.description: This field allows canisters to be marked 'remote' for certain networks. On networks where this canister contains a remote ID, the canister is not deployed. Instead it is assumed to exist already under control of a different project.

candid.title: Remote Candid File
candid.description: On networks where this canister is marked 'remote', this candid file is used instead of the one declared in the canister settings.

id.title: Network to Remote ID Mapping
id.description: This field contains mappings from network names to remote canister IDs (Principals). For all networks listed here, this canister is considered 'remote'.

ConfigDefaults.description: Defaults to use on dfx start.

canister_init_arg.title: Initialization Argument
canister_init_arg.description: The initialization argument for the bitcoin canister.
canister_init_arg.default: (record { stability_threshold = 0 : nat; network = variant { regtest }; blocks_source = principal "aaaaa-aa"; fees = record { get_utxos_base = 0 : nat; get_utxos_cycles_per_ten_instructions = 0 : nat; get_utxos_maximum = 0 : nat; get_balance = 0 : nat; get_balance_maximum = 0 : nat; get_current_fee_percentiles = 0 : nat; get_current_fee_percentiles_maximum = 0 : nat;  send_transaction_base = 0 : nat; send_transaction_per_byte = 0 : nat; }; syncing = variant { enabled }; api_access = variant { enabled }; disable_api_if_not_fully_synced = variant { enabled }})

log_level.title: Logging Level
log_level.description: The logging level of the adapter.

nodes.title: Available Nodes
nodes.description: Addresses of nodes to connect to (in case discovery from seeds is not possible/sufficient).

ConfigDefaultsBootstrap.title: Bootstrap Server Configuration
ConfigDefaultsBootstrap.description: The bootstrap command has been removed.  All of these fields are ignored.

ip.description: Specifies the IP address that the bootstrap server listens on. Defaults to 127.0.0.1.

port.description: Specifies the port number that the bootstrap server listens on. Defaults to 8081.

timeout.description: Specifies the maximum number of seconds that the bootstrap server will wait for upstream requests to complete. Defaults to 30.

packtool.description: Main command to run the packtool.

log_level.title: Logging Level
log_level.description: The logging level of the adapter.

domain.description: A list of domains that can be served. These are used for canister resolution [default: localhost]

log_level.description: Run replica with the provided log level. Default is 'error'. Debug prints still get displayed

subnet_type.title: Subnet Type
subnet_type.description: Determines the subnet type the replica will run as. Affects things like cycles accounting, message size limits, cycle limits. Defaults to 'application'.

bind.description: Bind address for the webserver. For the shared local network, the default is 127.0.0.1:4943. For project-specific local networks, the default is 127.0.0.1:8000.

providers.description: The URL(s) this network can be reached at.

HttpAdapterLogLevel.description: Represents the log level of the HTTP adapter.

compute_allocation.title: Compute Allocation
compute_allocation.description: Must be a number between 0 and 100, inclusively. It indicates how much compute power should be guaranteed to this canister, expressed as a percentage of the maximum compute power that a single canister can allocate.

freezing_threshold.title: Freezing Threshold
freezing_threshold.description: Freezing threshould of the canister, measured in seconds. Valid inputs are numbers (seconds) or strings parsable by humantime (e.g. "15days 2min 2s").

memory_allocation.title: Memory Allocation
memory_allocation.description: Maximum memory (in bytes) this canister is allowed to occupy.

reserved_cycles_limit.title: Reserved Cycles Limit
reserved_cycles_limit.description:
Specifies the upper limit of the canister's reserved cycles balance.

Reserved cycles are cycles that the system sets aside for future use by the canister. If a subnet's storage exceeds 450 GiB, then every time a canister allocates new storage bytes, the system sets aside some amount of cycles from the main balance of the canister. These reserved cycles will be used to cover future payments for the newly allocated bytes. The reserved cycles are not transferable and the amount of reserved cycles depends on how full the subnet is.

A setting of 0 means that the canister will trap if it tries to allocate new storage while the subnet's memory usage exceeds 450 GiB.

oneOf.description: Only the controllers of the canister can query the metadata.

NetworkType.title: Network Type
NetworkType.description: Type 'ephemeral' is used for networks that are regularly reset. Type 'persistent' is used for networks that last for a long time and where it is preferred that canister IDs get stored in source control.

PlaygroundConfig.description: Playground config to borrow canister from instead of creating new canisters.

playground_canister.description: Canister ID of the playground canister

timeout_seconds.description: How many seconds a canister can be borrowed for

init_arg.title: init_arg
init_arg.description: A default initialization argument for the canister that consumers can use.

init_guide.title: init_guide
init_guide.description: A message to guide consumers how to initialize the canister.

wasm_hash.title: wasm_hash
wasm_hash.description: SHA256 hash of the wasm module located at wasm_url. Only define this if the on-chain canister wasm is expected not to match the wasm at wasm_url. The hash can also be specified via a URL using the `wasm_hash_url` field. If both are defined, the `wasm_hash_url` field will be ignored.

wasm_hash_url.title: wasm_hash_url
wasm_hash_url.description: Specify the SHA256 hash of the wasm module via this URL. Only define this if the on-chain canister wasm is expected not to match the wasm at wasm_url. The hash can also be specified directly using the `wasm_hash` field. If both are defined, the `wasm_hash_url` field will be ignored.

wasm_url.title: wasm_url
wasm_url.description: The Url to download canister wasm.

WasmOptLevel.title: Wasm Optimization Levels
WasmOptLevel.description: Wasm optimization levels that are passed to `wasm-opt`. "cycles" defaults to O3, "size" defaults to Oz. O4 through O0 focus on performance (with O0 performing no optimizations), and Oz and Os focus on reducing binary size, where Oz is more aggressive than Os. O3 and Oz empirically give best cycle savings and code size savings respectively.
